entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
